程序包 carte

类 Carte

java.lang.Object
carte.Carte
public class Carte
extends java.lang.Object
A class representing the cards in the game Shape up.

Class Carte mainly contains the following functions: obtaining card attributes, set up card attributs, etc. For exemple: 

     Carte carte = new Carte(c);
     carte.toString();
从以下版本开始:
13 January 2021
版本:
%I%
作者:
WU Zhongyang, GUAN Mingjun
另请参阅:
Color, Fill, Shape

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    Color getColor()
    This method gets the color of the card.
    Fill getFill()
    This method gets the fill or not of the card.
    java.lang.String getPath()
    This method is used to get the file name of the corresponding card when implementing graphical interfaces.
    Shape getShape()
    This method gets the shape of the card.
    void setColor​(Color c)
    This method sets up the color of the card.
    void setFill​(Fill f)
    This method sets up the fill of the card.
    void setShape​(Shape s)
    This method sets up the shape of the card.
    java.lang.String toString()
    This method defines how the card is printed.

    从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Carte

      public Carte()
      This is the constructor of the class Carte.

    • Carte

      public Carte​(Carte c)
      This is the constructor of the class Carte.
      参数:
      c - The card to use.

    • Carte

      public Carte​(Shape s, Fill f, Color c)
      This is the constructor of the class Carte.
      参数:
      s - The shape of the card to set.
      f - The fill of the card to set.
      c - The color of the card to set.

  • 方法详细资料

    • getShape

      public Shape getShape()
      This method gets the shape of the card.
      返回:
      the shape of the card

    • setShape

      public void setShape​(Shape s)
      This method sets up the shape of the card.
      参数:
      s - The shape of the card to set

      public Color getColor()
      This method gets the color of the card.
      返回:
      the color of the card

    • setColor

      public void setColor​(Color c)
      This method sets up the color of the card.
      参数:
      c - The color of the card to set

    • getFill

      public Fill getFill()
      This method gets the fill or not of the card.
      返回:
      the fill of the card

    • setFill

      public void setFill​(Fill f)
      This method sets up the fill of the card.
      参数:
      f - The fill of the card to set

    • getPath

      public java.lang.String getPath()
      This method is used to get the file name of the corresponding card when implementing graphical interfaces.
      返回:
      The file name of the corresponding card represented by the string argument.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      This method defines how the card is printed.
      覆盖:
      toString 在类中 java.lang.Object
      返回:
      The output form of the card represented by the string argument.
